item.title: 5 Ways To Harness AI And End Poverty Forever
item.description: The International Day for the Eradication of Poverty reminds us of the preventable plight of deprivation. Can we seize AI to make a difference?

item.title: Eliminating Zombie Servers Could Save Billions
item.description: How using a Digital Twin of your Data Center can identify and reduce wasted IT infrastructure.

item.title: Is GenAI The New Powerpoint?
item.description: What artificial intelligence has done to presentations is clear when you compare new tools to the old standby: Powerpoint.

item.title: Major Adjustment Coming To The UFC’s Ranking System
item.description: The UFC President announced on social media his intentions to remove the media’s involvement from the promotion’s ranking system.
